summary: A caving expedition goes horribly wrong, as the explorers become trapped and ultimately pursued by a strange breed of predators.
cast: Shauna Macdonald|Natalie Mendoza|Alex Reid|Saskia Mulder|MyAnna Buring|Nora-Jane Noone|Oliver Milburn|Molly Kayll|Craig Conway|Leslie Simpson|Mark Cronfield|Stephen Lamb|Catherine Dyson|Julie Ellis|Sophie Trott|Tristan Matthiae|Stuart Luis|Justin Hackney
title: The descent
